headline: Little Change at U.S. Border as Trump Asylum Rules Face Lawsuits
summary: Facing legal challenges and armed with few details on how the Trump administration planned to carry out its new asylum policy, U.S. immigration agents proceeded as usual on the American side of the border Tuesday.

headline: President of Planned Parenthood Is Ousted
summary: Leana Wen was ousted as Planned Parenthood Federation of America’s president after just eight months, in a surprise move.

headline: From the Netherlands to North Korea, Kim’s Mercedes Take a Long Trip

headline: Amazon’s Two-Day Shipping Standard Slips for Some on Prime Day

headline: A Word From Nancy Pelosi Sends House Floor Into Chaos
